TEXT.TITLE: HARPER INTERNATIONAL <HNT> IN ACQUISITION
TEXT.BODY: Harper International Inc said it intends to buy the major asset, patents and trade name of Demarkus Corp, a designer and installer of process gas systems for the soft drink and brewing industries. The purchase price is about 125,000 dlrs. Demarkus' sales were 470,000 dlrs in 1986. Reuter
